message: I read this and thought, this person must use git. Then I looked at the groups you belong to... oh prejudice how accurate you can be sometimes.
I have no idea how the UI would be for this, but it would be great if you could branch off a part of the topic to a new topic
because of the chat nature, it often gets a bit off-topic and it would be great to organize it later
i could see that being a good admin feature
not sure about it being generally available... could lead to chaos
True, but if its a truly different topic (and maybe has a link from the old)
I think it might be a nice feature
@chrisdelbuck hahahahaha! it's only the wording that's inspired by Git though. after having many interleaved discussions on IRC it would be nice to be able to split it up into two topics
@judofyr Well there is a link underneath the message input field that is labeled 'Post as new topic?'.
